name: Phantom Run (hrooney)
description:
NOTE: There is currently a bug disabling the tutorial. Do not attempt to enter that door. Instead, use WASD to move, SPACE to jump and double jump, Q and E to dash left and right, and try any other door.

A simple 2D platforming and speedrunning game. Try to complete the individual levels or full game as fast as possible and see how fast you can get! This game is currently toward the end of development, so please enjoy and keep that in mind!

Controls not specified in the tutorial:

  • 'Return' or 'Enter' to choose a door in the starting hub
  • 'Escape' to return to the starting hub
  • 'R' to restart the level from the beginning
  • 'C' to restart from the last checkpoint
